Messages.Message: Shut your fuckin growler and have fun
Check out fortreeforums.xyz/ns2 for tutorials and configurations
Both pros and rookies alike are welcome here
You need 15 hours command time to command on this server. You can practice if there are < 10 players
All registered members of Fortree Forums are entitled to a reserved server slot
Smurfing is not allowed and will result in a permanent ban
You can earn in-game badges by posting on Fortree Forums and exchanging your on-site points for shop items
